website_summaries.verdict: Green Tidings is a perfect option for those looking for an all-natural deodorant to prevent odor.
pros: Without the use of any toxins, Green Tidings contains ingredients like tapioca starch to absorb moisture, and coconut oil to make skin soft and smooth
Only a few swipes need to be applied for effectiveness
cons: Since it is not an antiperspirant, Green Tidings won't stop you from sweating
Some have said it works for a while and then stops being as effective

customer_reviews.title: Clogged pores - OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this deodorant - and I did, for about three weeks. At that point, I began to notice that my armpits were sore and large bumps had formed. I stopped using the deodorant and hoped the problem would resolve on it's own, but no such luck. It got to the point where I could barely lift my arms due to the pain. Went to the doctor and she confirmed that I had numerous underarm abscesses likely due to clogged pores. This has never happened before, so I'm certain the deodorant is to blame. Started antibiotics today and hoping for some relief soon. Needless to say, I won't be purchasing Green Tidings again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummed this didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Took the pledge to go cruelty free with my beauty products and researched extensively for an organic deodorant that would work. Had high hopes for this product because of the great reviews. Sad to say that it did not work on me at all. The BO smell came out within a couple hours. Not only did it not work, but the product itself is very sticky and wet feeling when applied. Bummed it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Terrible rashes and welts!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible rashes and welts! It took a week of cortisone to get ride of the massive welts. Smells good at first but when put to the test it also failed miserably. I stunk! Save your money... still on the hunt! Schmidt’s rose deodorant also gave major welts on me. No go. Toms doesn’t cause rashes on me but does NOT work... both the normal natural smell and the new cotton fresh 48 hours are useless! Native is the one that hasn’t caused rashes either and the coconut one is just OK... I’ll use it after workouts. But not prior or during a presentation. It’s painful that the best is still secret. Maybe I’ll try their “natural” one next!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Plichta

customer_reviews.title: Much better organic deodorant products available on market, for less
customer_reviews.text: This wore out very quickly and there was goo everywhere each time we used it. There is an alternative product that is organic, vegan and works much better for us.] I recommend buying the bali secrets natural deodorant as it has lasted us 10 times as long. Bali secrets has lasted us about three months now and there's one person using it daily and the other uses it around 2x a week.
customer_reviews.author: HonestFeedback

customer_reviews.title: Small size but works perfectly - will purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for several days now and I'd say it works well! However, the bottle for $7.99 is less than half the size of a normal deodorant (see photo). The directions say to put on a small amount, so no swiping back and forth several times, which might make it last longer. It also is drier than normal deodorants, which means it doesn't glide on. Like I said, it's very dry and it keeps you very dry. I bought the lavender fragrance and love it! Very nice smell. So even though it's small and dry, it seems to work wonderfully. I will be purchasing it again, only the larger size next time.
customer_reviews.author: FLNewGirl

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: After breast cancer one of the changes I made is what I put on my body. I was never comfortable with the aluminum in my favorite antiperspirant (Secret) which I used most of my adult life. Trying to find a healthy alternative which was also effective was a losing battle, not to mention expensive. Green Tidings and Schmidt’s are my top picks. Quit searching, glad to help...wish someone told me sooner!
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have tried numerous natural deodorants, and this by far is the best. I do have to reapply on very warm days or days when I exercise a lot, but it definitely beats being embarrassingly musty! The lavender helps to mask odor as well. Another big plus is that this product does not make my underarms itch! A number of other natural deodorants did. I will continue to purchase and recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Joy H.

customer_reviews.title: No Odor!
customer_reviews.text: I finally made my switch to natural deodorant last week. I've been researching all over amazon for the best natural deodorants. During my search, I read many reviews for the other brands causing severe skin reactions and how there would be a period of time in which your body needed to get used to the deodorant. This made me nervous about making the switch. I made a decision to try out Green Tidings based on the overwhelmingly positive review and I'm so glad I did. It does well with the odor and I have not have had any skin reactions, nor adaptation phases so far. Please note that it does not prevent you from sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Shun-Yu Wu Wong

customer_reviews.title: Light Scent - Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I am always on the lookout for natural products. I came across Green Tidings while going through a list of natural deodorants but none caught my eye like Green Tidings. When I received the deodorant I immediatly like the packaing and was surprised at the nice size - most deodorants are small. The next day I used it and have been happy with the product ever since. It goes on dry and protects throughout the day. You do have to be careful not to have it get on clothing - however, I notice a little goes a long way. Great product. It is now my deodorant of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Try this. Follow directions of at least 3swipes. No need for more. Give it a chance!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve battled smelly armpits, yellow stains, and leftover smell even after washing for YEARS. Ive tried clinical strength priducts(too irritating for my sensitive skin) I’ve used this product for 1 month now, my armpits do not have that sour smell anymore, also noticed when not using it, my armpits aren’t as potent or smelly!!! I’m curious to see how a new top/dress will do over time when using this deodorant in terms of yellow stains/smell even after washing. Lastly, it does a decent job preventing excessive perspiration. But I’d rather sweat and smell naturally nice than sweat and smell like a mix of perfume and sour. Very BIG difference!!!! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: No smell of any kind!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to think this wouldn’t work...but it does. I actually have less odor with this than the clinical secret I was using. It has virtually no smell after it’s on, but I had absolutely no body odor even after hot yoga! Takes a couple tries to get used to spreading it as I live in a warm area. I just dab, then move my arm around to spread. I could see it being more difficult in an armpit with hair. But this stuff really works and no rashes or odor. What more could you want??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: THIS WORKS!!! I have been using Schmidt’s sensitive skin and about an hour into the day I smelled nasty. I’ve been looking for a natural deodorant that works and this is it!! I came home from school yesterday and nearly cried when I took off my hoodie and smelled ZERO BO!!! I have extremely sensitive skin and so far have no issue. Orange vanilla and Lavender are my favorite scents. The other ones aren’t my favorite but I’m sure others will like them. I’ll still use them until they’re out though. A little expansive but 10/10 would recommend. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling but does not help when sweating begins
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, but does not work well. I feel like this is why natural deodorants get a bad rap because I’ve used others that do actually work and are double the size. This does smell like flowers but does not hold up to people putting it to the test. So if you’re an adorable teen that wants to smell pretty and sit inside, go for it. But, if you do actual work outside in the heat... look somewhere else. I tried applying more and same results.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out 😔
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using this natural deodorant. At first, I was so pleased with it. It seemed to be working well and I liked the lavender scent. 2weeks after using it, I had red itchy bumps on my armpits. I had to discontinue the use of this deodorant and throw it out. I won't be buying this deodorant again. I'm disappointed things didn't work out with this product. (The bumps went away after a few days of putting 100% aloe vera gel and tea tree oil on them. Thank goodness!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Deoderant Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective deodorant! I've been trying to find a natural product to replace the one that is no longer available, and I found Green Tidings. It works better than the previous one. When using it for the first time, I did get a rash under one arm. But it disappeared quickly and I've had no more trouble. When using a new stick, it didn't go on as easily and looked dry on top. But I wiped the top a bit and it's now fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Finally a natural brand that works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 1 oz lavender to test it out after having a bad allergic reaction to a different brand's natural deodorant. I'm very pleased with Green Tidings. A natural deodorant that works and I haven't had a bad reaction yet after using it for a month. It holds up to the end of the day. A few cons: It goes on thick. I have to rub it in with my fingers like a lotion after applying or I have white smeared deodorant all over my underarms and clothes. Also, never ever ever use it right after shaving! Give it a few hours. Overall, I'm pleased after trying so many other natural brands, I'm buying this one again!
customer_reviews.author: j-me

customer_reviews.title: Tried them all - better than Secret Clinical
customer_reviews.text: It actually works. This is the first natural deodorant that I found that actually works. I experienced a 3 week detox period where I didn’t feel completely fresh and my pits turned tan. However, I’ve adjusted and keep reordering. My pits are smoother, easier to get a close shave, never smell, and hardly sweat at all...this is huge. I was a die hard secret clinical user prior to making the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Barzeski

customer_reviews.title: I like this natural deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I like this natural deodorant; the scent is nice and fresh! I use 'Secret' drugstore deodorant during the day and then I like to apply this natural product after showers in the evening to keep my underarms smelling fresh; therefore, I cannot speak to how long it will last throughout the day (but keep in mind that many natural deodorants may require reapplication a few times daily since they typically wear off faster). This deodorant has a more grainy consistency rather than silky/smooth, but it makes no difference after application. If you're looking for a natural deodorant, give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I thought it was a little pricey at first but after trying many others I was like why not. It's kind of thick when applying so you don't need much. It smells great and keeps me dry with no odor for a couple days. I was very surprised. I highly recommend it you at least try one. Your skin may or may not agree with it because it's thicker. Mine did. Staying dry with no odor after having it on all day is worth every cent for me. Just try it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this product except....
customer_reviews.text: I really like this deodorant except that it has a chalky consistency. It does not go on smoothly and thus gets all over your tank top in big white smudges. Love the smell and it works better than Tom's. Wish they could make a smoother product. Tom's goes on smooth and doesn't leave smudges on my clothes, but doesn't work as well at deodorizing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nice but Rash
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful for that this deodorant would work well. It smells pleasant, Goes on smoothly. It does paint clothing white so be careful. I tried it the first time in November and broke out in a rash. A few weeks went by and healed. Tried again this past week. Broke out in a rash again on both underarms.
customer_reviews.author: Kahuna101

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years - wont go back to store bought
customer_reviews.text: My mother told me my whole life those store deodorants were not good for me but none of the natural deodorants worked - a couple days and I didn't want to be around myself! I shrugged my shoulders and decided that I preferred the risk and not worrying about how I smelled to other people. I found this and gave it a try on a whim truly expecting to have to chuck it after a few days but instead it worked. No smell no skin reaction and the smell was for me much preferable to the perfume like scents of "powder" from my go to brands. So now 2 years later I still cant say enough good things about this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Wotila

customer_reviews.title: Tossing this one
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give some organic deoderant a try since being pregnant. I think this works against me. I smell much worse when wearing than if I have nothing on at all. It's pretty oily, which isn't the most exciting feeling to have under your armpits throughout the day. The packaging is also a bit odd. The deoderant is so soft that it sort of gels off around the edges of the packaging so that when you put the lid on there is residue on the outside. The plus side would be that it is genuinely organic so it is safe and smells ok. I won't be finishing the stick I bought, and won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brookeacc

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the calendula and sage (for sensitive skin), and while it was good for my sensitive skin, I didn't like the scent. The first time I used the lavender, I knew this was the right scent for me. It lasts all day for me. It doesn't break off like other natural deodorants I've used.
customer_reviews.author: PKR

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. The container won’t twist, so I can’t use it. I can’t meet the return window because my post office is only open a few days a month during this health crisis, so I’ll be keeping it. It’s infuriating that there is no way to contact the merchant. I’ve used this product for years, and I like it...if I can get it out of the container.
customer_reviews.author: mainestay

customer_reviews.title: No staining, works great
customer_reviews.text: I have read other reviews and was initially put it off by the fact it might stain my clothes. However after a year of using this I have had no issues with that. Everyone has different chemistry. It works great for me, I love the smell, its not overwhelming and after a long day of going in an out of patient rooms, and donning plastic gowns - I still manage to not smell like dorito:). I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: J Trelease

customer_reviews.title: a natural deodorant that really works
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant got me to finally switch to a natural product. It lasts a full 24 hours, which the other ones I tried failed to do. There have been no problems with skin irritation. A big plus is the lovely natural lavender scent. As a person who gets ill from most fragrances including most "natural" scents, a fragrance that I can enjoy is an even greater pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for at least three years. It works for me. Yes in the beginning it made my skin very red. But it's light pink now and I can deal with it. I've seen other reviews that complained about the redness but didn't keep using it. I say keep using it if you have problems with perspiration and smell. I Love this product and it's the only thing that works in the summertime for me. I can deal with a little redness if it works. Thanks and please do not sell out to a bigger company. I'd be very mad. 😏
customer_reviews.author: Connie H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It really works for me. I've tried other products after initially trying Green Tidings because I went through it so quickly. One of the products came in a jar with a small spatula for taking what you need off the top and applied it with my finger tips. It didn't work as well but it lasted so much longer (same amount of product). So, once I finished the unnamed deodorant , I kept the spatula order the 3 pack of Green Tidings and found the same original satisfaction with and longer shelf life for my daily use. I'd love to see Green Tidings offer another application of this great product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: tracella

customer_reviews.title: Longer lasting protection without irritation
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this product and even after giving one away to a friend who loves it as well, I still have a ways to go before I'll start using this recent pack. I'm hooked because not only does the lavender smells great, but there is no skin irritation and a little goes a long way while staying fresh all day.
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent odor control, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Really got the bad odor under control. Dont like the spread much, if u do it too rough, it will bunch up on the edge of the roller. Hard to explain. And if u do it too light u dont get that feeling of coverage so I just learned to trust it and it works. Great lavender smell. Arm pit smell - byeee!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique H.

customer_reviews.title: Really Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this deodorant and would recommend to anyone that has "sensitive" skin or has experienced negative effects from commercial deodorant riddle with harsh chemicals. If you have used it and it caused a skin rash or burn,it's probably not the deodorant and you might be allergic to one of the ingredients. I've seen a lot of reviews saying they had these sorts of issues with the product, i havent and will continue to purchase it .
customer_reviews.author: RogueShadows

customer_reviews.title: If you can’t handle baking soda, you can’t handle this.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that this deodorant would work for me. It didn’t. The smell and the ingredient components are almost identical to schmidt’s. I’m glad this deo works for some people but I have to warn those of you that get a rash from schmidt’s, this deo will give you one too. My pits were on fire. I still gave it a fair shot. I used it for a whole week and did as the instructions said about the vinegar spray and that the rash would slowly disappear in a week. It never did, it just got worse until all I had were open sores. It was not worth the pain.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Deoderant Ever
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worked for me until I found this. Maybe it's the probiotic, but other deodorants mask odor; this changes the chemistry somehow. It's something I won't live without. Great customer service, as well. It is NOT easy to spread, but because it works, I don't even care. And I'd rather it be healthy than easy to spread with all the extra crap they'd have to put in it to make that happen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Appears I Was Sent An Expired Item
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Green Tidings deodorant before, but this time the product seems to be old. It does not go on smoothly, but flakey. It is not effective. Then I noticed a date on the bottom. It is past. I wish I could have it replaced, but I did use it already. Now I must search for another product, as this one is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Toshiooi

customer_reviews.title: Better than shelf brands!
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant works better and smells better than any of the all natural brands I found in stores. I epilate and this product does not irritate my skin or clog my pores. A thin layer works best. This keeps me dry day to day, but in extreme heat I do sweat. I'm just not bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and honest company. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love and respect any company that chooses to put good ingredients in their products and actually cares about it’s customers! Thanks for caring and being honest about what goes in this deodorant! We definitely need more companies like Green Tidings. I love the smell and roller option of this deodorant. I got tired of scooping it out of a jar and applying with my hands with other natural deodorants. I recommend trying this out!
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for months for a natural, safe, and non toxic. I fell in love the first day!! And I didn't stink!! I have had swollen lymph nodes and abscesses underarms due to bad and toxic deodorants so I've been searching for a natural one and have had a hard time finding something that works. Thank you so much for helping me finally find something that works me and my body that's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but
customer_reviews.text: It works as well as any non-aluminum deodorant. BUT - it is expensive, and for the price, too much of it is left in the applicator when it is done. It is annoying and makes me not want to keep buying it even though it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: BDavpt

customer_reviews.title: BEST natural deodorant out there!
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite a while trying many different natural deodorants and finally came across Good Tidings! This is hands down the BEST natural deodorant I have ever used. I’ve been using it for 3 years now and will never go back to traditional deodorant. I love the fresh smell and of course the ingredients! One tube lasts for a long time, which I appreciate! If it is cold it is harder to roll on so I hold it under my armpit to warm it up and then it spreads easier. That’s the only minor downside, and really it’s not even a problem! Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jarek Elmasian

customer_reviews.title: Green tidings is the best natural deodorant that I have found that works for ...
customer_reviews.text: Green tidings is the best natural deodorant that I have found that works for me. I have no issues with odor when I use it and I don't even have to use it daily. The only downside to it is that I can't use it right after shaving my underarms because it causes a nasty rash. But if I wait a few hours and then apply it, it works great! This is the only deodorant I use now though - even in the hot summer!
customer_reviews.author: KwiatCat

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant you'll ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love your deodorant! I began using it after my first bout with brest cancer. I was worried about using any deodorant but after seeing the ingredient list I felt confident that this was for me. It takes very little and lasts longer tha any other deodorant I have used. I must admit that I still am using the first tube I bought back in March of 2016. Wonderful stuff! I am buying it for my daughter and have recommended it to a couple of friends. Thank you for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all natural deodorant!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product!!! I wanted to switch to a all natural deodorant so I took a chance and tried this one. I loved it from the start, but being on a budget thought it was a bit pricey. I tried numerous others that were less expensive and well all I’m going to say is I now have this one on auto ship! It really is a great product. Never felt “stinky” and doesn’t leave you feeling like you have a layer of gunky stuff under your arms! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Used Green Tidings lavender deodorant for about a month and it’s the best natural deodorant I’ve used so far! Very effective I’ve tried Toms, Primal Pit Paste and Native. All three have failed miserably. I did not react with a rash the way others have mentioned. Everyone’s skin is different. Give this stuff a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best deodorant I have ever used!! After studying holistic health and refining my personal care, I looked for a natural deodorant and found this one. So I tried it. You open the package and it doesn't smell 'clinical' like the big commercial ones do...this is like dabbing a light and creamy lavender scent under your pits. Glides on like silk, and you definitely do not need a lot for it to work!! I can go a whole year with three sticks, even when sweating a lot. If you are wondering if it works...yes, it is a wonderful addition to my personal hygiene routine. I lucked out on the first try!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for about a week now and am very happy with the product. I used a name brand for years and this works so much better. You don't need to use as much and it lasts all day! Other name brand products did not last all day and I would have to reapply just to make it through the day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a deodorant that was natural and not going to make me sweat after I put it on. This was the one!! No more sweating or BO smell. Great for sensitive skin and the lavender smells natural with its calming scent! Only downside was the price, but it was totally worth it after trying and getting good results!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bilka

customer_reviews.title: Flakes a lot; Gave me a Rash; No effect on odor
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I think the ingredients list is awesome. I even tried it on 4 different occasions throughout the month for a few days in a row and had the same disappointing results each time. The product did not go on smoothly. It flaked a lot. It gave me a rash. It had no effect on my underarm odor. But still I kept trying and trying because I so wanted it to work!!!! I guess it was worth a try....A very expensive try!
customer_reviews.author: EVsMOM

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: Looked a long time for a natural deodorant that actually worked. I love this product, and it works great even on the hottest of days still no odor. I it’s cold it can be hard to spread it just keep it under your arm pit for a few seconds and that solves the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, doesn't irritate, but may wax-stain your shirts
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame. I love what this did for me, but detail from the negative reviews is true—for some of us, the wax stains your shirt. (The reason I use non-aluminum deodorant is my weird body is of the subtype that sweats the aluminum into the shirts resulting in weird black metallic stains, so I was disappointed to see I still wasn't free of that) And for the record, every morning, after I applied this deodorant (very conservatively), I ran a piece of toilet paper over my skin to make sure I scooped up any excess. This still happened to me. :(
customer_reviews.author: Dack Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Very effective product, but buy the multi-pack not this one
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed with how well this worked! I made the mistake of buying this product thinking that it was larger than it really is. The product gets used up quickly, so you end up paying a premium for this single product that will last less than a month. I would definitely recommend buying the multi-pack. This product ends up being nearly ten dollars for a tiny little "sample size" container. Who spends that kind of money for a sample? (I did, but by accident) Also, guys, be careful when using this product. It will rip your arm hair out. It's a grippy paste that tends to tug at your hairs instead of gliding on like most commercial products.
customer_reviews.author: inkratas

customer_reviews.title: ... several brands of “all natural” deodorants only to be disappointed by their ineffectiveness to deal with odor
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands of “all natural” deodorants only to be disappointed by their ineffectiveness to deal with odor. I can honestly say that Green Tidings is the only brand of deodorant that is able to prevent “smelly” armpits. You can with confidence, wear this deodorant to the gym, work, play, etc. knowing you will not stink at the end of the day! I also love that this deodorant allows my armpits to perspire as my body heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: No more rash! Try this
customer_reviews.text: Just like many people here, I started using this product daily and develop a rash on my armpit. Before tossing the product in the trash, I decided applying it a different way. Before I apply the product, i scrub my index finger on a circular motion on top of the stick. After a few seconds, the top of the stick turns into a cream because of the friction and heat. I take the product on my finger and gently put it on my armpit. No more rash! I believe the scrubbing of the solid stick in my armpit was causing the rash and not the ingredients themselves. Hopefully ir works for you
customer_reviews.author: Kman

customer_reviews.title: I will use this forever!
customer_reviews.text: This has made a huge difference for me! I use to apply deodorant twice a day and still could not combat sweating and odor. I have sensitive skin and have not had any issues with skin irritations and it’s been one month since I started using the deodorant. The scent of lavender doesn’t really have a scent and that’s okay for me as it does what it’s supposed to do. I definitely noticed a reduction of my sweating and zero odor! Amazing! I never thought a natural deodorant would work. I’m very happy!
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this deodorant for about a week now and love it. It’s not an anti-perspirant, however I haven’t been sweating as much since I’ve been using it. It goes on light and haven’t noticed any residue on my tops from the product. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BW581

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Smells fresh. A few swipes to apply. Initially it seemed to spread hard but I use less pressure and in a mirror I did see it go on easily enough. I survived my Aerobics exercise classes with no odor so I can verify it works!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Prince

customer_reviews.title: It was the second all natural deodorant I tried (after the first wasn't strong enough) and I'm happy to report that it has worked wonderfully for going ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an alternative to traditional deodorant, which always seem to contain lots of chemicals and additives, when I found Green Tidings. It was the second all natural deodorant I tried (after the first wasn't strong enough) and I'm happy to report that it has worked wonderfully for going on 2 years! It's strong enough to cover up any body odor I have, even after a workout, and it's easy to use thanks to it's twist tube dispenser. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and smells amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I apply in the morning and am good all day! Unfortunately I started to have a reaction to one of the ingredients and had to discontinue use. But, I would still recommend giving it a try. I really liked it, and am quite bummed I had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: RoboDevil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but...
customer_reviews.text: For the first month it was amazing, and smelled great... after that I got a terrible rash under both arms... I figure maybe it’s the baking soda, so... sadly it’s not going to work out for me. It is a nice strong scent and never left me smelling bad, so if you’re looking for something good and aren’t sensitive to baking soda it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: JollyNova

customer_reviews.title: Was sceptical - pleasant pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical on this... but very happy with the results I teachmultiple cardio classes in a row.. talking with clients, and or members afterwards I try not to stink... this has worked better than what I was using before - dove deodorant which until now was my better choice over other brands. This smells nice, doesn't leave visible lines in the armpits and works ! I rarely write reviews but this one gets a big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Afrost

customer_reviews.title: gooey mess
customer_reviews.text: This product works fine, but it leaves a gooey mess in your armpit. I stopped using it because of how it goes on - too soft and mushy. Like rubbing elmers glue in your armpit.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Clean safe smell great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and i feel safe and secure while im wearing it. The peace of mind that im not applying harmdul chemicals to my body is also worth the asking price. I have a heavy hand so watch out when applying with extra pressure to avoid breakin off chunks of the deodorant or spreadin too much material on yourself. Ive ordered the item 3 times in a year and have mever broken out or had an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Poppy

customer_reviews.title: great deodarant
customer_reviews.text: I've used so many different deodorants trying to find the ones with no harsh chemicals but still works for odor and wetness. This is my most favorite so far. Still do sweat a lil when it's hot, but I don't smell! GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific, Long-lasting Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant lasts a long time, even with daily use. I bought my first container of it last year and didn't have to replace for several months. It smells pleasant and does a great job helping with sweat. I feel good about the ingredients and quality of the product. I would (and have) recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I order the lavender scented, 2.7oz. bottle 3-pack. It works well and protects me for 24 hours. At about $12 per deodorant stick, it's a little pricey in comparison to the $4 per sticks of the regular, big brand deodorants. However, I think it's much safer than using aluminum salt-based products. We're instructed to not use deodorant when we get a mammogram. One of my friends who was diagnosed with breast cancer was advised to immediately stop using aluminum salt-based deodorant. Hmmmm! So, I decided it was far better to be suspicious, healthy and spend a little extra than to trust "Big Pharma" under my armpits next to "my girls" every day.
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne G. Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Rash and Unresponsiveness
customer_reviews.text: I developed a rash on both of my underarms. The only change in my routine was using this deodorant, so I wrote to the company to see if other people had this problems. It has been weeks and still no response. I wanted to support small businesses but clearly they do not prioritize and support their customers. I looked up other Amazon reviews and saw others have had problems with rashes and unresponsiveness. By the way, this is not a "detox rash." I stay in a beach towns for months at a time annually and do not use deodorant when I am there and never had a reaction.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: This is easily the most effective natural deodorant I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the most effective natural deodorant I've tried. So why not a 5-star ratings? Two reasons" It's VERY expensive! It looks like a roll on but can't be used like one. I finished the first one I got - a small size - in about a week, because I used it that way. No. This, you make maybe 3 little runs under each arm, then smear over the rest of it. Not ideal. Still not about to change brands until someone comes out with something as effective that doesn't have one or both of tsehe drawbacks
customer_reviews.author: Andrew I. Capaloff

customer_reviews.title: Finally...
customer_reviews.text: I've searched and searched and searched and finally I found it.... The deodorant that doesn't have the chemicals I don't want but actually works! I actually had found another one that worked but it irritated my skin so badly that I had to stop using it and start the search again... until I found this one. So far I've only used the Lavender, I like that the scent is very mild. I will likely try the other scents too. I'm so happy to have found Green Tidings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All Around Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've only tried a few different "natural" deodorants, but this one works the best. It definitely hides any body odor and it goes on smooth. I had some rashing in the beginning but it didn't bother me (note: I do not typically have sensitive skin). Once I got over the initial phase (detoxing), my rash went away. I'm on my second bottle and will more than likely repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  It truly works and has a pleasant smell!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This deodorant actually works! I’ve tried several natural deodorants and ruined my blouses. I was going to give up on natural deodorant- this was literally going to be the last one I tried before go8ng back to secret. Please do not discontinue this deodorant! I rarely take the time to write reviews, but this was necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Get Rid of Your Chemical Filled Deodorants and Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product and will only buy this deodorant from now on! I have tossed my chemical filled deodorants in the trash! For whatever reason, my usual Dove and Secret deodorants were no longer effective, after using them for YEARS. I searched the Internet for truly natural products with good reviews, and found Green Tidings All Natural Deodorant. This outstanding product TOTALLY works. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND! I also gave one to a dear girlfriend who has extremely sensitive skin, and it works great for her as well. It has a very pleasant, light lavender scent, and not only is it a deodorant, it keeps my perspiration at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen N.

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great product IF....
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product IF you do not develop a reaction to the ingredients, which I did. Initially I was so happy with how effective it was. No oder at all! But with time (about a month) it started to cause a burning sensation and I developed cysts (deep zits that hurt) in my arms pits. So alas, I think I will not be able to use this great product anymore. It is worth it to buy the sample size to try it out. So much better without the chemicals that are found in regular deodorants and it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Logan

customer_reviews.title: VERY DRYING, NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely drying!!! Scent is lovely but it’s a tiny Amun’s so won’t last more than 2 weeks. Glides on smooth but thick and gummy. Leaves residue, scent turns into heavy musk after time and completely dries the underarm still your scratching and irritated. NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: so good. I haven't been outside in extreme heat
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about trying this deodorant, because other natural deodorants haven't worked for me. So far, so good. I haven't been outside in extreme heat, just around 80 degrees or so, but it held up. I will try and update once the summer kicks in. Update 7/22/2015 The deodorant still works in hot weather, into the 90s. I clean my arms with witch hazel or alcohol to kill off bacteria. My underarms have darkened, which is an unfortunate side effect, but because if the effectiveness, I still purchase it. You have to decide which side effect is worth dealing with: underarm odor, harmful ingredients, or darkened skin. I really hope this review helps you!
customer_reviews.author: Thundercats!

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR ANYONE WHO LIVES ORGANICALLY, NON-GMO, VEGAN, HEALTHY, NON-PLASTIC LIFE. MY GIRL AT THE TIME THAT I BOUGHT IT FOR LOVED IT. SHE DID SWITCH TO A DIFFERENT BRAND EVENTUALLY. SHE PREFERS LESS INGREDIENTS :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex awadalla

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A 100% NATURAL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SMELL OF THIS PRODUCT (LAVENDER)!! OUR BODIES ARE MADE TO SWEAT OUT "TOXINS". WHEN YOU USE AN ANTI DEODORANT IT STOPS THE PROCESS & KEEPS TOXINS IN YOUR BODY. WHEN YOU 1ST USE A NATURAL PRODUCT YOU HAVE TO GIVE YOUR BODY TIME TO RID THE TOXINS & IN TIME YOU WILL NOTICE A DIFFERENCE..I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT & WILL BE BUYING MORE IN THE FUTURE!
customer_reviews.author: T. SIWIK

customer_reviews.title: So happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was desperately seeking a natural deodorant that would actually smell good and hide body odor. I've been using prescription strength antiperspirant for years. I tried many brands looking for the right one and I loved this one!! I just ordered my second one as I used the first. The smell is great, and it hides body odor so well. I'm not worried about the "natural" smell lol!! Definitely wait a few minutes after shaving before applying to underarms if you have sensitive skin like me. It can burn a little on freshly shaven skin. I love this product and will keep ordering it in the future!!!
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: The BEST natural deodorant EVER
customer_reviews.text: I’m done searching. I found the BEST natural deodorant EVER. I apply every day but only shower every other or third day and, hands down, this stuff keeps me smelling awesome and feeling fresh throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST DEODORANT EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVEEE this product!!! It not only has a pleasant scent but it lasts all day long. I have always had a problem of traditional deodorants either smelling great at first but then awful not long after, irritation from ingredients or deodorants actually making me even sweat more. This product is a holy grail for me now! It lasts through work, school, working out, doesn't ruin my clothes AND I don't have to worry about odor or sweat!!! I will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: sydnei

customer_reviews.title: I love Green Tidings Deoderant!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many natural deoderants and nothing worked. Either I had irritation or I would stink. This deoderant is amazing. So far, I've had no irritation and its kept me from smelling. I sweat a lot, especially when I'm outside working. Its fantastic! It comes with a booklet explaining each ingredient and what to do if you have a PH imbalance. I highly recommend Green Tidings!!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my Green Tidings 1oz lavender purchase! This is the first all-natural deodorant I have used that actually has all-day staying power potential (caveat: you'll probably want to reapply after a workout or rigorous activity). I love the fact that it is applied like a regular deodorant and the consistency isn't sticky, slimy, or gooey. There's also nothing to wet and wait to dry like with other types of natural deodorants. Remember, this is not an antiperspirant, so sweating should be expected, but odor should not! The 1oz size has lasted me about a month and the natural lavender scent smells delightful. I will definitely be purchasing this product again in a larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only been using this a few weeks but it seems to be a good product. Nice scent and no skin sensitivity. Also appears effective without the harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to typical chemical brands
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this deodorant for quite some time and I am very satisfied. It works just as well as the store bought chemical filled ones. Yes, the texture is different, but it is easy to get used to and has a pleasant scent. One stick lasts a month.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: I mean the perfect Lavender combination
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start. I kicked chemical store bought deoderant two yrs ago. My search for Natural deoderant bought me to Schmidts, which I'm obsessed with. I also use Lush Cosmetics *Guv'ner which is a powder form natural deoderant...but I missed my twist up ones so I cane on here to do more research and found primal pit (horrible experience w/ that brand) & this. Omg! I got the *Lavender scent & it's perfection. I mean the perfect Lavender combination. Not too weak or strong. I love it! The consistency & scent in an all natural twist up form deodorant is just wht I needed. So now, I have three fav natural deoderants. Thanx Green Tidings...☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Lcharm

customer_reviews.title: I think its about the best natural deodorant out there
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant worked well when temperatures were cold. Anxious to see how well it works in the summer. I can tell you that i've worn it on normal round about days and to the gym and have had no issues. However, when i have stress sweat at work (I'm a nurse) it doesn't work as well. Thankfully, this doesn't happen every day i work but on those few occasions i've had to touch up with another product. The soreness i had in lymph nodes under my armpits have completely gone away; therefore, i will continue to use this product. I think its about the best natural deodorant out there.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff and I feel better using it
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff and I feel better using it. Only issue is that it can discolor clothing if you don't really give it time to set-- it does contain oil, just makes clothes a bit darker is all. It holds up on three hours straight of martial arts training 3x a week. Lavender is the best sent as something in the 'Scent free' version seemed to react oddly with my body's own natural smell. Five stars because I plan to keep using it. All the 'complaints' I have about it are minimal compared to what I used to deal with using store bought deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Works better than others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for the last 3 days, but I love it. It smells very subtle of lavender and it doesn't smell overwhelmingly which I appreciate. After sweating all day in the Miami heat, I still smell either like lavender or like nothing :-) No sweat smell! It takes a bit getting used to applying it - I try to do it slow (good way to practice mindfulness ;-) ) so that it doesn't crumble too much and goes on evenly. I sometimes even use my fingers to rub it on if crumbs develop. For a deodorant that works, I have no problems putting in more effort to apply it. Great product! Will be sure to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I am simply amazed at this product. I have been having underarm odor problems for several years. Have spent a fortune on deodorants and antiperspirants. Even tried homemade products. This is the best product I have ever used. Will be reordering forever! Thank you for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: lucee

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!  Don't wear under aluminum deodorant residue shirts
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other types of non-aluminum deodorants like the Crystal Rock and have had no success! I was SUPER impressed by this product. Not this will NOT stop a lot of sweat, JUST the odor. However even when sweating you're still not stinky! I wore this for a 12 hour hike in the smokies with NO SMELL! I even had my husband do a sniff test afterwards and he was amazed that he couldn't smell a thing! I've noticed that if I wore this with any shirt that still had aluminum deodorant residue (like a 2nd wear) it would smell HORRIBLY. However after I washed it again, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Never Thought This Would Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with complete skepticism. I'm trying to be more mindful about products I use, as well as food I eat. Considering store brand deodorant is packed full of cancer causing ingredients I researched natural deodorants without these chemicals such as aluminum. This product arrived and I had no high expectations after I tried it out. I'm here to tell you this is incredible. I even skipped a day to test out the long lasting claimed effects and it was still working 110%. I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: William DiMarie

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for another natural deodorant to use instead of Tom's. Since this received some many positive reviews I thought I would try it. It did a good enough job with controlling odor, but I found the flakiness of the product to be a turn off and won't be purchasing another one. If the formula were a little creamier and not so dry and flaky when applying it would have gotten 5 stars. I was also disappointed in the amount of the product for the price. I went through it faster than I do when using the natural deodorant sticks from Tom's.
customer_reviews.author: Mtnshopper

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: If works! After finding out all the toxins in my normal deodorant I have been using my whole life I decided to go all natural. When I first got this is was kinda weirded out, not gonna lie. But after a few uses I got use to it. It's a lot harsher on the skin putting it on, it's not creamy like the other stuff. Instead of rubbing it all over I kinda have to dab it on because it's so course, especially don't rub it on right after shaving, I did this and it got very irritated and painful. But I haven't been really sweaty at all (not much of a sweater though) and it smells great
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: We really like this
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these now. MY husband and I both use them and love them. We don't feel like our pit stick as much and they do not feel like the pores are clogs like when using regular deodorant. It has a nice light scent. You do have to use it for awhile for your body to detox.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha

customer_reviews.title: works as well as the drug store stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews. I chose this and one other natural deodorant. I like that this one is vegan. I have used it under snow clothes in winter in northern Minnesota (on a 30+ degree day no less, and I was in four layers) anyway I was sweating like a pig and came home to NO b.o. stench! That was amazing! Also, shipping was fast and product matched it's description exactly! Yes it does cost a fortune, but my health is worth it!!! The lavender scent is okay too. not too strong! update ************I have ordered more product in non-scented and am very pleased*****
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for 20 days. I bought it because it was on a Good Housekeeping list of great natural deodorants. Good news: It didn't cause a rash like some people report for natural deodorants. It worked better than Tom of Maine Bad news: It didn't deodorize well at all. To be fair, I tried this before detoxing my armpits, which is supposed to help you smell less naturally. After detoxing, I used Soapwalla deodorant which seems to work much better, although it's much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: No smell here
customer_reviews.text: Wow it's been a week and I smell good. I have used all kinds of brands and nothing ever works. I was going to make my own. Which is the same ingredients they have but if I can buy this never mind. Even the next day you still smell good. I do admit the first hours you smell the lavender but after that there is no smell. Great product and have already recommended to some vegan friends. FYI I am not vegan. Keep up the great product * update Just bought the three pack. Still liking being free of smelly arm pits. I can't comment on shaving cause i wax my arm pits. Love love this product
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been trying all natural deodorants for the past two years. We have a couple we like and use regularly, and many we used for a couple weeks and tossed in the trash. This one takes the cake for sure! It smells so good, and doesn't leave a slimy feeling after application. It really works great! UPDATE For all you with the red rash, that's caused from chaffing, not an allergy to any ingredients. With that being said, I'm sure a couple people might have an allergy or sensitivity to a specific ingredient, but for most of you, it's pretty much a heat rash in the skin crease.
customer_reviews.author: alisha Weissgerber

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had multiple concerns prior to making this purchase. I really wanted to make the switch to an all natural deodorant, however, was unsure as to whether it would be able to work for me. I've been using it for less than a week, but so far it works better than any deodorant I've actually owned. It does not stain any of my clothing, the smell is great and I don't sweat at all. Keep in mind that it will react differently to everybody. I've had a very good experience so far with it and I'm definitely going to be making future purchases from his brand as soon as I ran out of the one I currently own.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: falling apart and wattery badly stored
customer_reviews.text: This item is badly stored or something!!wattery falling apart and sticky And cannot be returned!! After many times and buying this item,I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Eli m

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After being treated for breast cancer I realized I could not go back to my antiperspirant. This was a problem as due to excessive sweating with body odor which is unacceptable working as a nurse. I tried all the others Tom's, Liquid crystal,etc that worked for a short time but needed to be reapplied several times during the day. Took a chance on this and am so glad I did!.Has a light pleasant lavender scent, does not irritate my underarms and can be used sparingly. It will leave a slight white residue at first that I found can be solved by not getting dressed immediately. Will be ordering this in bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Beth D

product_meta.title: Green Tidings Natural Lavender Deodorant | Vegan, Organic Deodorant for Men and Women, Fragrance Free & Aluminum Free Deodorant, Underarm Antiperspirant 2.7 Oz 1 Pack
feature_bullets: GO GREEN. SMELL CLEAN: Green Tidings natural lavender deodorant for men & women, lasts up to 48 hours & helps absorb wetness, which tends to significantly lessen when one ditches pore-clogging antiperspirants. We are one of the best-selling, top-rated & best-reviewed organic & vegan deodorants for good reason.

WHY DOES GREEN TIDINGS WIN AWARDS? Non-Toxic. Organic ingredients. Solar Made. Cruelty-Free. Vegan. Aluminum-Free. Gluten Free. No Parabens. No Mineral Salts (crystal deodorants, and mineral salts contain aluminum!) No Perfumes & No to all the others nasties! SLS, Talc, Propylene glycol, Perfumes, Petroleum or Petrolatum, Pthalate, Paraffin, Mineral Oil, Artificial Colors, Silicone Oil, Menthol, Phenol, or Salicylic Acid.

ZERO COMPROMISE: We use even use 100% Solar Power to create our moisturizing and soothing natural deodorant lavender scent. Organic Coconut Oil, Shea Butter (Fair Trade), Wild Crafted Candelilla Wax & a few other essentials are mixed with 100% pure native lavender essential oils to bring you all day, extra strength protection.

WE HAVE OPTIONS! Our deodorant comes in 2 sizes, the 1 ounce size is best as a "tester" size, or for travel or your gym bag. Our 2.7 ounce tube is our full-size deodorant. All of our bulk 3 packs are 15% off! Choose from our Vetiver Citrus, Lavender, Jasmine Rose, Floral Spice, Vetiver Citrus, or Unscented option, and look for our Sensitive Skin version, a baking-soda free option if that suits you better.

A PARENT’S PROMISE: Being a parent and a business owner, both mean responsibility for uncompromising reliability. If you ever feel that we could do better, please let us know and we will make it RIGHT! ***NOTE: OUR CLEAN DEODERANT EXPIRES 3 YEARS FROM THE DATE ON THE BOTTOM OF THE BOTTLE (WHICH IS THE DATE OF MANUFACTURE)***

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
